page.title: 16LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
For adults, outdoor sports and going to the theatre are very popular but twice as many people choose gardening as their chief leisure time activity. The recently opened "Beckley Snooker Club" in Oxford attracts a number of people from the area. Amongst other actvities mentoned are walking, shooting, swimming, music and sailing,
Both outdoor sports and cycling are very popular with the children. Cubs, Brownies, Scouts, Youth Club and swimming are also popular. Other activities include sailing and skating (at the new Oxford Rink.)
